Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant

Plant is a singleton that supports one or more reactors (beta).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlantScheduler
    A scheduler for Plant, created by PlantConfiguration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelayAOp
    Returns a result after a delay.
    PlantBase
    Plant is a singleton and is the top-level object.

Package org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.plant Description

Plant is a singleton that supports one or more reactors (beta). Plant takes its name from manufacturing plant, with the reactors performing the application processing. A plant consists of a configuration, a recovery strategy, a scheduler, a thread pool and an internal reactor.

Related Tutorial Pages

  • Getting Started -- See system properties Debug and Configuration
  • Recovery - When failures occur
  • Delays - Scalable Timers
